<<<<<<< HEAD
A discourse of the happy union of the kingdoms of England & Scotland dedicated in private to King James I / by Francis Lord Bacon. Briefe discourse touching the happie union of the kingdomes of England and Scotland Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.
23 p.
Printed by Tho. Milbourn, and sold by A. Baldwin ..., London : 1700.
Gibson describes A1 as blank; in this copy it has half-title: Articles touching the union of England and Scotland. cf. Gibson, R.W. Francis Bacon 67. First published (1603) as A briefe discovrse, tovching the happie vnion. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======
A discourse of the happy union of the kingdoms of England & Scotland dedicated in private to King James I / by Francis Lord Bacon. Briefe discourse touching the happie union of the kingdomes of England and Scotland Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.
23 p.
Printed by Tho. Milbourn, and sold by A. Baldwin ..., London : 1700.
Gibson describes A1 as blank; in this copy it has half-title: Articles touching the union of England and Scotland. cf. Gibson, R.W. Francis Bacon 67. First published (1603) as A briefe discovrse, tovching the happie vnion. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
A. Baldwin
Tho. Milbourn
